00050 Exception::Exception(const std::string& rMessage,
00051                      const std::string& rFilename, unsigned lineNumber)
00052 {
00053     SetMessage(rMessage, rFilename, lineNumber);
00059     // std::string log_file_message = "Exception occurred (although possibly handled), error message:\n" + message;
00060     // LOG(1, log_file_message);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Exception::SetMessage(const std::string& rMessage,
00064                            const std::string& rFilename, unsigned lineNumber)
00065 {
00066     std::string posix_filename(ChastePosixPathFixer::ToPosix(fs::path(rFilename)));
00067     mShortMessage = rMessage;
00068     std::stringstream line_number_stream;
00069     line_number_stream << lineNumber;
00070     mMessage = std::string("\nChaste error: ") + posix_filename + ":"  + line_number_stream.str()  + ": " + mShortMessage;
00071 }
00072 
00073 std::string Exception::GetMessage() const
00074 {
00075     return mMessage;
00076 }
00077 
00078 std::string Exception::GetShortMessage() const
00079 {
00080     return mShortMessage;
00081 }
00082 
00083 std::string Exception::CheckShortMessage(std::string expected) const
00084 {
00085     std::string error;
00086     if (mShortMessage != expected && mShortMessage != "Another process threw an exception; bailing out.")
00087     {
00088         error = "Incorrect exception message thrown: expected (" + expected + "); got (" + mShortMessage + ").";
00089     }
00090     return error;
00091 }
00092 
00093 std::string Exception::CheckShortMessageContains(std::string expected) const
00094 {
00095     std::string error;
00096     if (mShortMessage.find(expected) == std::string::npos && mShortMessage != "Another process threw an exception; bailing out.")
00097     {
00098         error = "Incorrect exception message thrown: expected it to contain (" + expected + "); got (" + mShortMessage + ").";
00099     }
00100     return error;
00101 }
00102 
00103 #define COVERAGE_IGNORE //Termination NEVER EVER happens under normal testing conditions.
00104 void Exception::Terminate(const std::string& rMessage, const std::string& rFilename, unsigned lineNumber)
00105 {
00106     std::stringstream error_message;
00107 
00108     error_message << "\nChaste termination: " << rFilename << ":" << lineNumber  << ": " << rMessage<<"\n";
00109     std::cerr << error_message.str();
00110 
00111     /*
00112      * Check if we're running in parallel.
00113      */
00114 
00115     PetscBool is_there;
00116     PetscInitialized(&is_there);
00117     if (is_there)
00118     {
00119         MPI_Abort(PETSC_COMM_WORLD, EXIT_FAILURE);
00120     }
00121     else
00122     {
00123         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00124     }
00125 }
00126 
00127 #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE // Termination NEVER EVER happens under normal testing conditions
